ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Postretirement Benefits
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from postretirement benefits.

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Available-for-Sale Securities, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on available-for-sale securities.

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Aggregate Intrinsic Value, Vested
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Intrinsic value of vested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
